entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 in the Canada Bay area this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High zero with temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High zero with temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023
